bibl.title: A Proposed Rereading of P. Oxy. 654 line 41 (Gos. Thom. 7).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. IV, 654 (= van Haelst 593; LDAB 4030), 41. ""It is quite possible that substantial portions of the Coptic version of Thomas go back to a Greek original.""
bibl.seg: Simon Gathercole, A Proposed Rereading of P. Oxy. 654 line 41 (Gos. Thom. 7).
P. Oxy. IV, 654 (= van Haelst 593; LDAB 4030), 41. ""It is quite possible that substantial portions of the Coptic version of Thomas go back to a Greek original.""
